description: two figures in center of image with their heads close together; the figure on the left has his hand raised with his thumb extended; at the bottom of the image is the profile of a smaller head looking up at the other figures; in the upper right is a circle
inscription: LL in pencil, below image: 1. | LL of sheet, in pencil: Probedruck. | LLC of sheet, in pencil: Dr. Rauert E.171 B | BC margin of sheet, in pencil: Zu: 1. Buch Mose. Kap 37
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 23 / S3
title: Joseph is sold out of envy by his brothers. Plate II, "Let's throw him into a pit"
